alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Washington, northwestern Hyde, northeastern Beaufort and west central Tyrrell Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pungo, or 17 miles south of Plymouth, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Ponzer, Pungo, Pike Road, Leechville, Wenona, Scuppernong, Pungo Lake, Phelps Lake and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
